page.title: 08FORD HOME LIFE MORNING
page.content: My name is John. This is a brief account of my Saturday. I get up at 9am and get dressed.I go downstairs and eat my breakfast.Typically this consists of bacon and egg with a glass of orange juice.Often I run errands for my mother.I go to the local grocers to buy some bananas,tomatoes and onions.I buy some pork chops and sausages from the butchers. I meet my friend Daniel in the grocers and we both return the groceries to my mother.Then we take a ride on our bicycles around the village.At about 12-45pm Daniel goes home for his lunch and I have mine.After lunch I have a short rest.In the afternoon Daniel and I and my parents go down to the{RIVER {SEVERN}and sail as far as{MONTFORD {BRIDGE.}
